text: Læw rea k thahı thang sxng nan tk xyu nı sing thi man txngkar xan neuxngcak kar hlxklwng khran meux thang sxng di lim rs tnmi tn nan læw sing xan phung laxay khxng khea thang sxng k phey hı pracaksʹ kæ khea thang sxng læa khea thang sxng k reim pkpid bn(swn thi na laxay)khxng khea thang sxng cak bımi hæng swn swrrkh nan læa phracea khxng khea thang sxng cung di reiyk khea thang sxng (doy klaw wa)kha midi ham cea thang sxng keiyw kab tnmi nan dxk hrux?
